phrases: Presented by SoulEaterFan
Presented by SoulEaterFan
Hold your breath
Deadly Night awaits us
You desired it,
the world like that
to reflect in those eyes
OOHO
Even if those dreams will be scary
For your sake, Fairy Blue
Breaking of stars
was decorated by
So do not stop believing!
As long as I am looking at
the brightly shining moon.
My dried lips
are exposed to
the freezing sun.
Overflowing tears
with its reflecting shine,
keep falling down my cheeks.
Hoping to make up,
I have been looking for you
in dreary places.
When our fingers made contact
the only thing that was scrambled
was your loneliness
The wish we held on
in the middle of our heartbeats,
if only that was our destiny...
Although I have lost you,
the memories you left behind,
along with your image,
even now
remain within' me...
Charge!
Baba Yaga' s
Castle
Why is Everything Suddenly so Unclear?
The Last Demon Tool
The Weaponless Kid' s Impossible Mission?
It is alright, Asura.
I will protect you...
Always...
Always.
Everything is so confusing.
Too many things have happened.
Everything just seemed to happen all at once.
But right now,
Shibusen is ignoring all those matters.
The world is about to be consumed by madness.
It is only reasonable that they are focusing on that.
After all, Shibusen was founded for the purpose of stopping the Kishin.
I understand that...
As well as the current situation.
But...
Cannot sleep?
Leave me alone.
Being like that will only affect your performance in tomorrow's operation.
It is not like you are a kid who is about to go on a long trip.
Hey Soul,
Huh?
It is okay like this, right?
Huh?
What are you talking about?
Is Shibusen really doing the right thing?
It seems that they have stopped looking for Professor Stein...
And I am also bothered by what Kid said.
Besides,
even Crona is left locked up in that cell.
Like I would know more about that than you...
If you have the time to act like someone you are not,
why not use it to get some sleep?
Be careful, you two.
Sure, just leave it to us!
We will kick the Kishin's ass and come back before you know it.
Maka...
It is going to be okay.
Everyone is with us.
Sure.
Let us go, Maka.
Hmmm...
Everyone is giving it their best.
I must give it my best too!
Charge!
The Castle of Baba Yaga Why is Everything Suddenly so Unclear?
The main objective of this operation is to eliminate the Kishin,
and those who act in accordance with the Kishin, Arachne, and her organization, Arachnophobia.
We will launch an attack on the enemy's location, the Baba Yaga Castle
and the madness amplifier's relay stations.
Therefore, we expect everyone is full cooperation.
Deceits...
Cover-ups...
They are all being broadcast in such a lifeless way.
To me, they are just turning a blind eye to more important matters.
Right now, the madness released by the Kishin is being spread throughout the world.
This, undeniably, will also be a battle against time.
Our first objective: The suppression of the Kishin.
Our second objective: The destruction of the madness amplifier, as well as all its relay stations.
Our third objective: The elimination of Arachne, and also Arachnophobia.
But, I cannot deny all the things that have happened up until now.
We are looking forward to your effort.
We have also anticipated that you might get close to the Kishin,
so please do not forget to take your anti-madness suppressant.
Well, Shinigami-sama, if you would, please.
Everyone!
Do your best!
Is that it?
We will now commence the operation.
Our destination is the Castle of Baba Yaga.
Sid-sensei...
Huh?
There is something I would like to ask you.
What is it?
Crona...
What are they going to do to her?
Please tell me.
You know, right?
She has been exiled.
Huh?
From information theft to causing internal disturbance, she is done a significant amount of damage to Shibusen.
If she was treated with the ordinary method, her punishment would be much more severe.
That...
That means...
When I was alive, I used to have very tight lips.
That is the kind of man I was.
Huh?
That part of me is still the same, even now.
What I am about to tell you is all my personal opinion,
but I think her being exiled is nothing more than a cover-up.
Crona and Marie both went to Medusa.
With Marie-sensei?
Why?
As of yesterday, Marie resigned from her post as a Shibusen teacher.
Crona intends to settle everything with Medusa once and for all.
With Medusa...
It is going to be okay.
Marie will be alongside Crona.
That is why you should just focus on this operation.
We at Shibusen are expecting a lot from your anti-demon wavelength.
So that is it?
That is how they are going to deal with it?
Is this the way the adults are going to let it end?
I am sorry, Maka.
Is something wrong, Crona?
Uh, no...
It is nothing.
Well, if that is the case, then let us get a move on.
Sure.
It is like last time, in the desert...
The desert which I escaped to...
But,
this time, it is different.
Maka, I am sorry I kept the truth from you.
But, I am not running away anymore.
We should split our forces into three groups
and make the attack from three directions at the same time.
And we should have our forces at the six relay stations synchronize...
and execute their attacks at the exact same time.
This is the first grand-scale operation since the founding of Shibusen, huh?
Shinigami-sama, the anti-madness medicine...
Is it really going to be effective?
If there was really something like that,
I would already have had it delivered throughout the world.
Just as I thought.
It is a relief to know that.
That is obvious though, is not it?
But why am I stationed here?
Yeah, I wonder why.
Are not you the one who made that decision?!
We are dealing with the Kishin, so I do not think there is such a thing as having too many forces on the field.
And based on my analysis, even sending in all the Deathscythes would not be too much.
That is easier said than done!
In this difficult time, you have not only myself, but even Marie and Kid on different assignments...
I find this contradicting common sense.
We cannot tell for sure what is going to happen on the battlefield,
so we must be prepared for any kind of situation that might arise.
Do not you get it?!
It is not that simple!
Scary!
Even so, our forces are being spread out too much.
Hey, why do not you stop making that scary face and join us for a cup of tea.
Yeah yeah, there is cake too!
Be more serious, you two!
That is why it never goes well between us.
What was that?
Nothing!
Absolutely nothing!
Well, everything is going to fall into place when the time comes.
In the meantime, we will think of ways to deal with it.
Well...
I did say that I would like the help of a cat but...
I am Blair the cat.
I will be working as your assistant starting today!
I am Lisa from Cabakura!
I am Alyssa!
Why the hell did he really get a cat for me?!
We are now entering Arachnophobia's territory.
Each team proceed to your designated point,
and from there we will make our attack.
Maka, is something wrong?
No, nothing.
Are you getting cold feet?
There is no need to worry!
The fact that I am here makes this the safest place in the entire world!
Black Star, you are making too much noise!
Huh?
Are you still thinking about those meaningless things?
But...
If you fight half-heartedly,
things will not turn out well.
Of all people, you should know this best!
But Sid-sensei and Shinigami-sama are counting on Maka-chan's anti-demon wavelength, right?
It is meaningless to put faith in an ability I cannot master.
But that is not what makes you a great person!
There is nothing about me that is great.
Damn, that is the thing about elite students!
Yahoo!
Right on the point!
Hey, Black Star!
What, you got a problem with that?!
Oh yeah, you had a talk with Sid in the corridor, right?
You mean about the anti-demon wavelength?
Like I told you, it is useless...
Not that, I am talking about Marie and Crona.
Huh?
Do you know the true meaning behind his words?
Huh?
Because of the deal that Shibusen made with Medusa,
nobody from Shibusen can do anything to Medusa.
But it is a totally different story for the exiled Crona and Marie, who quit her job.
Huh?
For Shinigami-sama to take such a lowly action,
it might be exactly as Kid has said.
Shibusen itself could possibly be dangerous.
Sneaky!
How can Shibusen do such a thing...
I wonder if Kid's absence has anything to do with it.
I guess it would be bad if I made a fuss out of every little problem I had, huh?
I think it would be a lot weirder if you did not think about it.
I came here to win.
Win and win every single battle!
After all that,
I am going to surpass God!
There he goes again.
You are sound asleep, huh?
Asura.
It will be all right, as long as you are here.
If you remain here,
the world will soon be consumed by madness.
Until then, I will always remain by your side.
Arachne-sama, there is something that needs your attention.
Let us hear it.
We have detected forces from Shibusen coming towards us.
Shibusen?
It seems they are searching for the way into Baba Yaga Castle.
Indeed.
But why are they heading this way?
Shibusen's operation is too large...
They have also deployed six other quadrons across the world.
Six squadrons?
Their targets are the relay stations.
And their main force is quickly approaching us.
How did they...
Do not tell me... it is Medusa's doing?!
Prepare for counterattack.
Have all the troops ready, stop Shibusen at all costs!
Yes!
Hurry up with the preparations!
If they will not move when we need them, they might as well just be a pile of rubble.
Yes sir!
This is it,
I will grind you all to bits!
Stein, it is starting.
Come, let us witness it until the very end.
The destruction of this outdated order.
The world shall be reborn anew.
This is the fifth squadron, we have arrived at the designated location.
Third squad here, reporting from the target location.
This is the seventh squad, we are okay to go.
Captain, all the squadrons are ready to go.
Good.
All squadro-
Huh?!
Let us see some blood!
Chainleg, third gear!
Let us go, you maggots!
This attack...
I have seen it before.
Ah, so we meet again.
Heh, as my opponent, I am going to grind you up good!
They are here!
Commence battle!
Yahoo!
This is going to be one hell of an on-stage performance!
Hold on, Black Star.
What?
Maka...
The Kishin must be defeated.
What Shibusen is doing is right.
But,
that is why...
Leaving Professor Stein and Crona as they are now will never be okay for me.
It is unsafe to believe in Shibusen without being cautious.
I can never do that.
But,
I do not know what I am supposed to do.
Ah, you are such a noisy crybaby!
Bla bla bla bla...
What the hell is wrong with you?
What is your problem now?
You do not have to talk like that, do you?
What are you doing?
Open your eyes and tell me what you want to do!
Oh...
So that is it.
Geez,
Papa used to tell me to choose my friends wisely.
What he said is true.
I am an elite student,
but being with you is turning me into a bad one.
Heh.
Sorry!
But I am leaving the rest to you, Black Star.
Huh?
What?
I am going to do things the way I want to.
Take care of the rest.
Hey.
This is some kind of joke, right?
Heh, she is still an elite student, even now.
I am coming, Crona!
